backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with all persistent types, maps, authorization mixins, and helper validation/role-checking functions for orders, designs, users, and images.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature fixes to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend components, hooks, and pages and their behaviors or architectural roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables for light and dark mode plus global styling for background, text, and borders.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell with root div and script entry for the React application.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining name, icons, colors, start URL, and display mode.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling caching strategy, versioned cache, offline fallback, skipWaiting, and cache cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React router setup with authentication bootstrap, role checks, error boundaries, and layout routing for all major pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/KarigarSum: Computes karigar order stats and displays selectable summary cards with counts and quantities.
frontend/src/components/admin/TotalQtyBr: Dialog showing total quantity breakdown with a grand total and per‑category values.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access‑denied message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/BlockedUser: Displays a blocked‑account warning and provides a logout action.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Shows profile‑loading errors with retry, logout, and optional error details.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and PWA cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/NoProfileBl: Informs authenticated users without profiles and lets them copy their principal ID.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Admin-only modal for initial profile setup that saves the admin’s name.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Gate component that restricts children rendering based on allowed roles.
frontend/src/components/designImages/Des: Table rendering design image mappings with codes, names, and creation dates.
Dialog that loads and displays a design image by code, handling loading, errors, and blob URL cleanup.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Global React error boundary that shows an error UI, technical details, and options to reload or clear session.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorDeta: Collapsible panel that reveals technical error details and allows copying them to clipboard.
frontend/src/components/errors/InlineErr: Inline error alert showing a message, optional technical details, and an optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/exports/ExportAc: Dropdown export menu for CSV and karigar-specific PDF/JPEG exports, filtering orders and handling export flows.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarD: Export bar for a single karigar enabling PDF/JPEG export of daily or total orders.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarE: UI card allowing users to filter orders by date or design and export them as PDF or JPEG.
frontend/src/components/karigar/AddKarig: Dialog to create a new karigar with duplicate-name validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/karigar/KarigarO: Dialog showing detailed order info for a karigar, including metadata and a button to view design images.
frontend/src/components/karigar/TotalKar: Dialog listing all karigars with search, loading/error states, and selection callback support.
Top-level application shell rendering role-based navigation, header, and layout structure with mobile/desktop menus.
frontend/src/components/masterDesigns/Ma: Form dialog to create or edit a master design, manage karigar assignments, and handle reassign confirmations.
Dialog for importing master designs from files, parsing them, previewing results, and saving updates.
Table displaying master designs with karigar names, status indicators, and edit/activate actions.
frontend/src/components/orders/Ingestion: Displays a scrollable preview table of imported orders, marking unmapped design codes and showing order details with formatting helpers.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersDat: Shows a warning banner when invalid cached orders are detected, offering a button to clear cache and reload.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersFil: Provides search and filter controls for orders, including date ranges, karigar, status, and type filters with clear‑all support.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersTab: Renders the main orders table with optional row selection and design image viewing, formatting order attributes for display.
frontend/src/components/orders/PartialFu: Dialog for entering partial supplied quantities for multiple RB orders with validation and confirmation.
frontend/src/components/orders/RbSupplie: Dialog allowing users to edit an RB order’s total supplied quantity with validation and backend update mutation.
frontend/src/components/status/BackendSt: UI component showing backend reachability with refresh, canister ID display, and collapsible error details.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectiv: Status bar that shows online/offline state and pending offline sync uploads with a manual sync button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Periodically runs health checks on the backend and exposes online/offline status, errors, and canister info.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyToClipboard.ts: Clipboard helper hook providing copy status and a label function.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user profile with error classification and controlled retries.
frontend/src/hooks/useEffectiveAppRole.t: Derives the user’s effective app role using profile data and admin backend checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrdersCache.ts: Hydrates orders from IndexedDB, merges with backend data, sanitizes cached entries, and exposes loading/error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping actor API calls for fetching and mutating orders, master designs, karigars, and related data.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates a backend actor with timeout, identity handling, optional admin initialization, and retry logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining light/dark themes, layout constraints, and admin dashboard tab styling.
frontend/src/lib/exports/karigarOrdersDo: Generates and triggers an HTML-based printable PDF view for a karigar’s orders with iOS-compatible handling.
frontend/src/lib/exports/ordersExport.ts: Filters orders by type, formats them, and exports the result as a downloadable CSV file.
frontend/src/lib/karigars/normalizeKarig: Normalizes karigar names by trimming, collapsing spaces, and lowercasing for consistent comparison.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/applyMasterDesi: Applies master design mappings to orders, producing mapped/unmapped sets and a preview with resolved fields.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/normalizeDesign: Normalizes design codes by trimming and collapsing whitespace for consistent matching.
frontend/src/lib/orders/chunkOrders.ts: Splits an orders array into batches of a specified size with input validation.
frontend/src/lib/orders/deriveMetrics.ts: Computes aggregate order metrics and per-karigar statistics using sanitized orders.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatKarigarNam: Formats karigar names, returning 'Unassigned' when blank or whitespace.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatOptionalNu: Formats optional numeric fields into fixed-decimal strings or empty strings when invalid.
frontend/src/lib/orders/generateKarigarP: Creates a deterministic PO code from a karigar name using the first three letters plus 01, defaulting to UNA01 for empty or unassigned names.
frontend/src/lib/orders/getOrderTimestam: Returns an order's timestamp as a Date, preferring uploadDate over createdAt and converting nanoseconds to milliseconds.
Checks whether an order type string contains 'co'.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersDesign: Sanitizes and sorts orders by normalized design code, then by order number.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersKariga: Sanitizes and sorts orders by karigar name, then design code, then order number.
frontend/src/lib/orders/validatePersiste: Validates PersistentOrder fields and filters arrays to valid entries while counting skipped ones.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/extractIm: Loads an XLSX file as a zip and extracts embedded images from xl/media, assigning them to rows in order.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseDesi: Parses a worksheet with Sl no, Design code, and Image columns and maps embedded images to rows.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseMast: Parses master design entries from an Excel sheet using flexible column matching and normalized headers.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseOrde: Parses orders from an Excel sheet with flexible column matching, numeric validation, warnings, and error collection.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/readWorkb: Ensures XLSX is loaded, reads an Excel file into a workbook, and validates sheet presence.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/masterDesignPar: Dispatches master design parsing to PDF or Excel handlers and wraps errors with user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/orderParser.ts: Routes PDF or Excel files to appropriate parsers and returns parsed orders with warnings and friendly errors.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/extractText: Loads pdf.js from CDN and extracts structured text lines from each PDF page for downstream parsing.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseMaster: Parses master design entries from flattened PDF text lines by detecting headers and extracting design, generic name, and karigar mappings.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseOrders: Parses orders from PDF text using table-row or section-header formats, preserving karigar context and validating fields.
Parses a single PDF table row into an order when format and tokens are valid, extracting numeric fields and karigar info.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: Implements IndexedDB storage for orders, master designs, and queued ingestions with helpers for caching and queue management.
frontend/src/offline/sync.ts: Provides a hook to sync queued offline ingestions to the server with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Dashboard that loads orders, filters them by date and tab, computes metrics, and displays tables, summaries, and export options.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DesignImagesPag: Page for uploading, parsing, validating, and saving design image mappings from an Excel file.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MasterDesignsPa: Displays and filters master design entries with dialogs for adding, importing, and viewing karigar lists.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Admin interface for creating users, managing approvals, and blocking/unblocking user accounts.
frontend/src/pages/karigar/KarigarDashbo: Karigar dashboard that loads active orders, filters and sorts them, manages cache, and supports bulk delivery actions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login page with branding, background, and a sign‑in button.
frontend/src/pages/setup/BootstrapAdminP: One-time setup page that accepts a bootstrap token to initialize the first admin and reinitialize actors.
frontend/src/pages/staff/IngestOrdersPag: Handles uploading, parsing, mapping, previewing, and submitting order files with progress, error handling, and master design mapping.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffDashboardP: Displays staff dashboards with multiple tabs and filterable order tables, deriving metrics and filtering by date, type, karigar, and status.
frontend/src/pages/staff/UnmappedDesignC: Shows unmapped design codes grouped by code with search and a dialog to add new master design mappings.
frontend/src/pwa/clearPwaCaches.ts: Clears Cache Storage and unregisters service workers to remove stale PWA assets.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker, checks for updates, auto-activates new versions, and reloads on controller change.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapErrorClassif: Classifies bootstrap errors into stopped-canister, network, or general errors and extracts diagnostic details.
frontend/src/utils/errorPresentation.ts: Converts raw errors into user-friendly messages using bootstrap error classification and decoding logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing) and storing, retrieving, or clearing them in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting if it exceeds the specified duration.
frontend/src/version.ts: Exports a static build identifier string for version tracking.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins used by the frontend.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, known UI issues, and existing feature-fix requirements for the KarigarFlow project.
